t: Is Paul Smith a brand for rich people? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Yes, Paul Smith is considered high fashion and is preferred by many people due to his affluent sense of style and class. The prices are also quite high, therefore the fashion collection is not mainstream or can be found in every store.
